prompt: A professional woman learning manager in her mid-30s stands by a wooden table in a sunlit, plant-filled office, smiling confidently toward the camera. She wears a tailored navy blazer over an ivory blouse with simple stud earrings; arms lightly crossed in a relaxed, approachable posture. Background shows an airy open-plan workspace with a large potted fiddle-leaf fig, wooden shelves holding books with spines turned away, and two colleagues chatting in soft focus near a high table. On the table: a closed linen notebook, a pen, a ceramic mug, and a glass water bottle. Natural morning window light, soft shadows, shallow depth of field, 50mm portrait, eye-level, warm neutral palette with touches of green. No devices, no screens, no text, no posters, no whiteboards, no logos, no abstract shapes.

A professional male training director in his early 40s sits at a wooden desk in a contemporary office lounge, looking at the camera with a relaxed, confident smile. He is a Black man wearing a light gray blazer over a crisp white shirt and dark chinos, sleeves neatly rolled. The background features a large window with an out-of-focus city view, an indoor plant, and a minimalist wooden credenza; a coworker passes by in soft focus. On the desk: a closed leather notebook, a pencil, and a ceramic cup. Warm late-afternoon sunlight with gentle rim light, shallow depth of field, 85mm portrait, eye-level, cinematic composition with warm wood and sage accents. No laptops, no phones, no screens, no text, no posters, no whiteboards, no logos, no abstract shapes.
